compute_units.notes: RDNA 3 integrated GPU, 12 CUs, 2900 MHz boost

notes: AMD Ryzen 9 8945HS mobile APU (Hawk Point). Top-tier heterogeneous compute with Zen 4 CPU cores (higher clocks than 8845HS), RDNA 3 integrated GPU, and XDNA NPU. Shares DDR5/LPDDR5 memory across all units. NPU optimized for AI inference via DirectML/ONNX. GPU supports ROCm for general compute.
